description: Nice Design and works as it should.
summary: Nice Design and works as it should

description: Some more features and options would be amazing (such as a logof the test results, or the option to automate the app to run in predetermined times), but this app already is amazing as a simple tool! Amazing job!
A simple speedtest app that does what is advertised, what else can I say?
Servers are too far that measurements are not accurate at all.
Lamentablemente, todos los mirros que usan están lejos de donde me encuentro, Argentina. Por lo que las mediciones no son precisas.
summary: Solo útil si estás en el hemisferio Norte

description: Application qui remplit parfaitement son job tout en étant presque aussi précis que des site comme speedtest by ookla ou autre.
Fait tout ce qu'on lui demande, rien de superflu. Plus de localisations de serveurs serait peut être la bienvenue mais encore c'est pas gênant.
It just does what it says on the tin and does it well, without any bloat between you and the result. Nice work in my book.
summary: Simple, efficient, gets the job done
